# Introduction to PyTorch: Core Functionalities and Advantages

## Goal
 This session will guide participants through the basics of PyTorch's core functionalities. We'll closely examine PyTorch's capabilities with a specific focus on applying it to a sample dataset, setting the stage for a subsequent hands-on session. The goal is to arm participants with the essential knowledge and confidence required to begin utilizing PyTorch in their deep learning endeavors, ensuring they're well-prepared for practical application and further exploration.
